messages.subject: considering unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/8/03 11:00:46 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/8/03 11:00:46 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Thank you :-) It was awesome meeting you too. You seem like an earth
motherly type, radiating calm and peace :-) >>

She does, she does!! I got to be Marji's roommate the entire weekend, what a
privilege. I miss her so much, that calm, peaceful energy just radiates
around her. She's an inspiration.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
